channel.title: [317]Problem with Port Forwarding
channel.description:
*i know that ive already posted, but no one answered me*
Hey guys well when i was my dads house i could port forward and play on my server fine.
But at my moms i cant im having trouble port forwarding, at my dads I port forwarded easy with D-Link.
But here i use linksys and now i can't port forward, where it says 192.168.1.[number here],
i have to put in a number but i cant, if i put in 1 itll say can use the routers IP, but if i use 0 i know what probably wont do anything, and then when i put that in and SAVE the settings, i go back and its not there! it didn't even save! i don't know what to do, can some body please help me?
I've tried utorrent, but that didn't work either
Thanks in advance.

item.title: [317]Problem with Port Forwarding
item.dc:creator: @Legendary_K0 Legendary_K0
item.description:
@Legendary_K0 wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:4, topic:327984”]Start -> Run - > cmd -> ipconfig /all

If you can read, you’ll see what you’re looking for.[/quote]

I can obviously read, but i don’t know what i’m looking for, if it’s the .104 at the end i have to add there, it doesn’t work.

Can someone please help me?

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Problem with Port Forwarding
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Start -> Run - > cmd -> ipconfig /all

If you can read, you’ll see what you’re looking for.

Read full topic

BUMP

item.title: [317]Problem with Port Forwarding
item.dc:creator: @Legendary_K0 Legendary_K0
item.description:
@Legendary_K0 wrote:

i know that ive already posted, but no one answered me

Hey guys well when i was my dads house i could port forward and play on my server fine.

But at my moms i cant im having trouble port forwarding, at my dads I port forwarded easy with D-Link.

But here i use linksys and now i can’t port forward, where it says 192.168.1.[number here],

i have to put in a number but i cant, if i put in 1 itll say can use the routers IP, but if i use 0 i know what probably wont do anything, and then when i put that in and SAVE the settings, i go back and its not there! it didn’t even save! i don’t know what to do, can some body please help me?

I’ve tried utorrent, but that didn’t work either

Thanks in advance.
